result.reason: Launching external tools via `%SystemRoot%\System32` from a 32-bit mRemoteNG process is WoW64-redirected to 32-bit binaries, which breaks expected telnet/PowerShell behavior on 64-bit Windows.
result.approach: Add path normalization for external tools so `System32` can resolve to `Sysnative` when needed on 64-bit OS, with fallback and a small regression test.

attempts.raw_output: {"decision":"implement","reason":"Launching external tools via `%SystemRoot%\\System32` from a 32-bit mRemoteNG process is WoW64-redirected to 32-bit binaries, which breaks expected telnet/PowerShell behavior on 64-bit Windows.","priority":"P2-bug","estimated_files":["mRemoteNG/App/ExternalTools/ExternalToolLauncher.cs","mRemoteNGTests/App/ExternalTools/ExternalToolLauncherTests.cs"],"approach":"Add path normalization for external tools so `System32` can resolve to `Sysnative` when needed on 64-bit OS, with fallback and a small regression test."}
